Photographer: [Photographer's Name] If the photographer's name is not known please indicate IPPA Staff as the Photographer
label: The European Chess Team Championships are now underway in Haifa with 224 competitors from 26 countries, At the moment the Russian team is in third position and have expressed their disappointment following their poor start, They say they are very tired alter having taken part in so many previous tournaments this year, Also two grandmasters, Garry Kasparov and Anatoly Karpov are not taking part in this tournament, However with a week to go the Russians are still fighting for the first place, Thirteen year old Yehudit Polger a Grandmaster from Hungry, with an already world wide reputation, has already helped to put her country into fourth place so far.

sequences.label: The European Chess Team Championships are now underway in Haifa with 224 competitors from 26 countries  At the moment the Russian team is in third position and have expressed their disappointment following their poor start  They say they are very tired alter having taken part in so many previous tournaments this year  Also two grandmasters  Garry Kasparov and Anatoly Karpov are not taking part in this tournament  However with a week to go the Russians are still fighting for the first place  Thirteen year old Yehudit Polger a Grandmaster from Hungry  with an already world wide reputation  has already helped to put her country into fourth place so far.
